price: They carved houses in the mountains, feeling secure[41].
arabic: وَكَانُواْ يَنۡحِتُونَ مِنَ ٱلۡجِبَالِ بُيُوتًا ءَامِنِينَ
footnotes: [41] These mountainous strongholds gave them a false sense of security against any consequences.

version.title: English Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Englsih by Rowwad Translation Center in cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: wakānū yanḥitūna mina al-jibāli buyūtan āminīna
